short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provide on-site visual feedback for websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PageTuner allows you to provide on-site visual feedback for websites. This means you can select any element on the page and change its content, upload new images, add comments, and many more! Then you can export these changes to XLS or PDF formats, or even invite other people to your project and collaborate.
